ygData.subject: Re: Phobia
ygData.msgSnippet: Trying anything would be a mistake on my part. I agree. You saw the capabilities of my ship during your battle when I tried to break up your battle. I barely

"Trying anything would be a mistake on my part. I agree. You saw the 
capabilities of my ship during your battle when I tried to break up 
your battle. I barely scratched this planet and didn't even come 
close to my target. With such weapons do I honestly pose a threat to 
you or your mighty warship? I am far to intelligent to attempt such a 
suicidal attack when I'm fighting for survival. I'm setting a course, 
send me accurate coordinates for your landing bay.

"Computer, mask all incoming transmissions from my babies. Record all 
incoming transmissions from the Destron base, send a direct link to 
me if the Predacons answer my signal.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Kluster::
> 
> Kluster rubs his hand on his chin as he hears Phobia's suggestion.
> 
> "I guess that would be acceptible," he replies, "But the defences 
would be 
> armed and ready, so trying anything wouldn't be good."
